<title level="1" right="Rules">[Affixed or Etched](/Rules.aspx?ID=700)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 535 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Some items enhance other items. Talismans function only if affixed to other items. They have a Usage entry indicating the type or types of items to which a character can attach them, such as “affixed to armor.” Rules for affixing a talisman are on page 565.

 Runes must be etched onto permanent items, such as armor, weapons, or [_runestones_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=247) to grant their benefit. Adding or transferring a rune takes downtime to accomplish. The Usage entry indicates the type or types of items a rune can be etched into, such as “etched onto a weapon.” More information about etching runes is found [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=736).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
